speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0163/2008 ) by Mr Piecyk, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on an integrated maritime policy for the European Union ( 2008/2009(INI) .
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0163/2008 ) by Mr Piecyk, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on an integrated maritime policy for the European Union ( 2008/2009(INI) .
agenda_item: An Integrated Maritime Policy for the European Union (debate)
